name: Fleet Diversity
desc: When multiple (non-mothballed) ships have the same base hull ID, -%s combat readiness for each duplicate [Nexerelin]

name: SNAAAAAKE!
desc: Agents have a %s higher detection chance and %s higher injury chance [Nexerelin]

name: Erinyes Protocol
desc: Vengeance fleets are %s larger, hunt player for %s longer, have %s S-mod per ship, and have the %s and %s skills [Nexerelin]

name: Militia Power
desc: Higher maintenance and lower max CR when DP of true military ships exceeds civilian/militarized ships (maximum %s and %s) [Nexerelin]
